# Model 
```{r}
ode_model <- function(time_space, initial_contamination, parameters){
  with(
    as.list(c(initial_contamination, parameters)),{
      dContamination <- (1-Contamination/C)*r-d*exp(-g*time_space)*Contamination
      return(list(dContamination))
    }
  )
}
```

# Easy ABC
```{r}
n=10
pacc=0.4

trait_prior=list(c("unif",1e-1,1e2),c("unif",1,3e3),
+ c("unif",1e-2,1e2), c("unif",1e-2,1e2))

sum_stat_obs=c(134,202,294,400,644,1232,2044,2868)

ABC_Lenormand<-ABC_sequential(method="Lenormand", model=ode_model,
+ prior=trait_prior, nb_simul=n, summary_stat_target=sum_stat_obs,
+ p_acc_min=pacc, use_seed=TRUE)
```
